queries.name: Return All Azure Users that are part of the 'Global Administrator' Role

queryList.query: MATCH p =(n)-[r:AZGlobalAdmin*1..]->(m) RETURN p

queries.name: Return All On-Prem users with edges to Azure

queryList.query: MATCH  p=(m:User)-[r:AZResetPassword|AZOwns|AZUserAccessAdministrator|AZContributor|AZAddMembers|AZGlobalAdmin|AZVMContributor|AZOwnsAZAvereContributor]->(n) WHERE m.objectid CONTAINS 'S-1-5-21' RETURN p

queries.name: Find all paths to an Azure VM

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n)-[r]->(g:AZVM) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all paths to an Azure KeyVault

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n)-[r]->(g:AZKeyVault) RETURN p

queries.name: Return All Azure Users and their Groups (Warning: Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:AZUser)-[r:AZMemberOf*1..]->(n) WHERE NOT m.objectid CONTAINS 'S-1-5' RETURN p

queries.name: Return GUEST Azure Users and their Groups

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:AZUser)-[r:AZMemberOf*1..]->(n) WHERE NOT m.objectid CONTAINS 'S-1-5' AND m.userprincipalname=~ '(?i).*#EXT#.*' RETURN p

queries.name: Return All Azure Users and their Admin Roles

queryList.query: MATCH p=(n)-[:AZHasRole|AZMemberOf*1..]->(:AZRole) RETURN p

queries.name: Return All Azure Users and their owned Devices (Warning: Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(d:AZDevice)<-[r1:AZOwns]->(m:AZUser) RETURN p

queries.name: Return All Azure Admins and their owned Devices

queryList.query: MATCH p=(d:AZDevice)<-[r1:AZOwns]->(m:AZUser)<-[r2:AZHasRole]->(n) RETURN p

queries.name: Return All Azure AD Groups that are synchronized with On-Premise AD

queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectid CONTAINS 'S-1-5' AND n.azsyncid IS NOT NULL RETURN n

queries.name: Find all Privileged Service Principals

queryList.query: MATCH p = (g:AZServicePrincipal)-[r]->(n) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all Owners of Azure Applications

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n)-[r:AZOwns]->(g:AZApp) RETURN p

queries.name: Find the Shortest path to a high value target from an owned object

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((g {owned:true})-[*1..]->(n {highvalue:true})) WHERE  g<>n return p

queries.name: Find the Shortest path to a unconstrained delegation system from an owned object

queryList.query: MATCH (n) MATCH p=shortestPath((n)-[*1..]->(m:Computer {unconstraineddelegation: true})) WHERE NOT n=m AND n.owned = true RETURN p

queries.name: Find all Certificate Templates

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' RETURN n

queries.name: Find enabled Certificate Templates

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.Enabled = true RETURN n

queries.name: Find Certificate Authorities

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Enrollment Service' RETURN n

queries.name: Show Enrollment Rights for Certificate Template

queryList.title: Select a Certificate Template...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' RETURN n.name
MATCH p=(g)-[:Enroll|AutoEnroll]->(n:GPO {name:$result}) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' return p

queries.name: Show Rights for Certificate Authority

queryList.title: Select a Certificate Authority...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Enrollment Service' RETURN n.name
MATCH p=(g)-[:ManageCa|ManageCertificates|Auditor|Operator|Read|Enroll]->(n:GPO {name:$result}) return p

queries.name: Find Misconfigured Certificate Templates (ESC1)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enrollee Supplies Subject` = true and n.`Client Authentication` = true and n.`Enabled` = true  RETURN n

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Misconfigured Certificate Templates from Owned Principals (ESC1)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enrollee Supplies Subject` = true and n.`Client Authentication` = true and n.`Enabled` = true return p

queries.name: Find Misconfigured Certificate Templates (ESC2)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true and (n.`Extended Key Usage` = [] or 'Any Purpose' IN n.`Extended Key Usage`)  RETURN n

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Misconfigured Certificate Templates from Owned Principals (ESC2)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true and (n.`Extended Key Usage` = [] or 'Any Purpose' IN n.`Extended Key Usage`) return p

queries.name: Find Enrollment Agent Templates (ESC3)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true and (n.`Extended Key Usage` = [] or 'Any Purpose' IN n.`Extended Key Usage` or 'Certificate Request Agent' IN n.`Extended Key Usage`)  RETURN n

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Enrollment Agent Templates from Owned Principals (ESC3)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true and (n.`Extended Key Usage` = [] or 'Any Purpose' IN n.`Extended Key Usage` or 'Certificate Request Agent' IN n.`Extended Key Usage`) return p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Vulnerable Certificate Template Access Control (ESC4)

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((g)-[:GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.`Enabled` = true RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Vulnerable Certificate Template Access Control from Owned Principals (ESC4)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[r*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE g<>n and n.type = 'Certificate Template' and n.Enabled = true and NONE(x in relationships(p) WHERE type(x) = 'Enroll' or type(x) = 'AutoEnroll') return p

queries.name: Find Certificate Authorities with User Specified SAN (ESC6)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Enrollment Service' and n.`User Specified SAN` = 'Enabled' RETURN n

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Vulnerable Certificate Authority Access Control (ESC7)

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((g)-[r:GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|ManageCa|ManageCertificates*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Enrollment Service' RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Vulnerable Certificate Authority Access Control from Owned Principals (ESC7)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((g {owned:true})-[*1..]->(n:GPO)) WHERE  g<>n and n.type = 'Enrollment Service' and NONE(x in relationships(p) WHERE type(x) = 'Enroll' or type(x) = 'AutoEnroll') RETURN p

queries.name: Find Certificate Authorities with HTTP Web Enrollment (ESC8)

queryList.query: MATCH (n:GPO) WHERE n.type = 'Enrollment Service' and n.`Web Enrollment` = 'Enabled' RETURN n

queries.name: Find users with blank passwords that are enabled

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE NOT u.userpassword IS null AND u.enabled = TRUE RETURN u.name,u.userpassword

queries.name: Find users with Temp in user title and created in the last 30 days

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) where u.enabled=TRUE and u.whencreated  > (datetime().epochseconds - (30 * 86400)) AND u.title CONTAINS 'Temp' RETURN u

queries.name: Find users created in the last 30 days

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) where u.enabled=TRUE and u.whencreated  > (datetime().epochseconds - (30 * 86400)) RETURN u

queries.name: Find users' credentials in description fields

queryList.query: MATCH (m:User) WHERE m.description CONTAINS 'password' RETURN m.name, m.description

queries.name: Find Server 2000 and Enabled

queryList.query: MATCH (H:Computer) WHERE H.operatingsystem =~ '(?i).*(2000).*' AND H.enabled = TRUE RETURN H

queries.name: Find Server 2000 with session

queryList.query: MATCH (H:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(y) WHERE H.operatingsystem =~ '(?i).*(2000).*' RETURN H

queries.name: Find Server 2003 and Enabled

queryList.query: MATCH (H:Computer) WHERE H.operatingsystem =~ '(?i).*(2003).*' AND H.enabled = TRUE RETURN H

queries.name: All computers without LAPS and the computer is enabled

queryList.query: MATCH p = (d:Domain)-[r:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer) WHERE c.haslaps = false AND c.enabled = true RETURN p

queries.name: Find Server 2003 with session

queryList.query: MATCH (H:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(y) WHERE H.operatingsystem =~ '(?i).*(2003).*' RETURN H

queries.name: Find Server 2008 and Enabled

queryList.query: MATCH (H:Computer) WHERE H.operatingsystem =~ '(?i).*(2008).*' AND H.enabled = TRUE RETURN H

queries.name: List all owned users

queryList.query: MATCH (m:User) WHERE m.owned=TRUE RETURN m

queries.name: Kerberoastable Admins

queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectsid =~ $sid WITH n MATCH p=(n)<-[MemberOf*1..]-(m {hasspn: true}) RETURN p

queries.name: All Kerberoastable Users

queryList.query: MATCH (n {hasspn: true}) RETURN n

queries.name: Where can owned users RDP

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:User {owned: true})-[r:MemberOf|CanRDP*1..]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Users with most local admin rights

queryList.query: MATCH (U:User)-[r:MemberOf|AdminTo*1..]->(C:Computer) WITH U.name as n, COUNT(DISTINCT(C)) AS c RETURN n,c ORDER BY c DESC LIMIT 5

queries.name: All Owned Nodes

queryList.query: MATCH (n {owned: true}) RETURN n

queries.name: Find computers with owned Admins

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((n:User {owned:true})-[r:AdminTo|MemberOf*1..]->(c:Computer)) return p

queries.name: Find owned Groups

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User {owned: true})-[r:MemberOf]->(g:Group) RETURN g

queries.name: Find owned Domain Admins

queryList.title: Select a domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.name =~ $name AND n.owned=true WITH n MATCH p=(n)<-[r:MemberOf*1..]-(m) RETURN p

queries.name: Find Shortest Path from owned Node to Domain Admin

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.name =~ $name RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH (n:User),(m:Group {name:$result}),p=shortestPath((n {owned:true})-[r:MemberOf|AdminTo|HasSession|Contains|GpLink|Owns|DCSync|AllExtendedRights|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|WriteDacl|WriteOwner*1..]->(m)) RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest paths from owned objects to High Value Targets (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((n {owned:true})-[:MemberOf|HasSession|AdminTo|AllExtendedRights|AddMember|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|CanRDP|ExecuteDCOM|AllowedToDelegate|ReadLAPSPassword|Contains|GpLink|AddAllowedToAct|AllowedToAct|SQLAdmin|ReadGMSAPassword|HasSIDHistory|CanPSRemote*1..5]->(m {highvalue:true})) WHERE NOT n=m RETURN p

queries.name: Most exploitable paths from owned objects to High Value Targets (5 hops)

queryList.query: MATCH p=allShortestPaths((n {owned:true})-[:MemberOf|AdminTo|AllExtendedRights|AddMember|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|AllowedToDelegate|ReadLAPSPassword|Contains|GpLink|AddAllowedToAct|AllowedToAct|SQLAdmin|ReadGMSAPassword|HasSIDHistory*1..5]->(m {highvalue:true})) WHERE NOT n=m RETURN p

queries.name: Next steps (5 hops) from owned objects

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((c {owned: true})-[*1..5]->(s)) WHERE NOT c = s RETURN p

queries.name: Unconstrained Delegation systems

queryList.query: MATCH (c {unconstraineddelegation:true}) return c

queries.name: Constrained Delegation systems

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u)-[:AllowedToDelegate]->(c) RETURN p

queries.name: Unconstrained Delegation systems (without domain controllers)

queryList.query: MATCH (c1:Computer)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-516' WITH COLLECT(c1.name) AS domainControllers MATCH (c2 {unconstraineddelegation:true}) WHERE NOT c2.name IN domainControllers RETURN c2

queries.name: (Warning: edits the DB) Mark unconstrained delegation systems as high value targets

queryList.query: MATCH (c1:Computer)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-516' WITH COLLECT(c1.name) AS domainControllers MATCH (c2 {unconstraineddelegation:true}) WHERE NOT c2.name IN domainControllers SET c2.highvalue = true RETURN c2

queries.name: Shortest paths from owned principals to unconstrained delegation systems

queryList.query: MATCH (n {owned:true}) MATCH p=shortestPath((n)-[:MemberOf|HasSession|AdminTo|AllExtendedRights|AddMember|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|AllowedToDelegate|ReadLAPSPassword|Contains|GpLink|AddAllowedToAct|AllowedToAct|SQLAdmin|ReadGMSAPassword|HasSIDHistory|CanPSRemote*1..]->(m:Computer {unconstraineddelegation: true})) WHERE NOT n=m RETURN p

queries.name: Users with adminCount, not sensitive for delegation, not members of Protected Users

queryList.query: MATCH (u)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid =~ "(?i)S-1-5-.*-525" WITH COLLECT (u.name) as protectedUsers MATCH p=(u2:User)-[:MemberOf*1..3]->(g2:Group) WHERE u2.admincount=true AND u2.sensitive=false AND NOT u2.name IN protectedUsers RETURN p

queries.name: Groups that contain the word 'admin'

queryList.query: Match (n:Group) WHERE n.name CONTAINS 'ADMIN' RETURN n

queries.name: Find users that can RDP into something

queryList.query: match (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintext=True MATCH p1=(u1)-[:CanRDP*1..]->(c:Computer) RETURN u1

queries.name: Find users that belong to high value groups

queryList.query: match (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintext=True MATCH p=(u1:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(m:Group {highvalue:true}) RETURN u1

queries.name: Find kerberoastable users

queryList.query: match (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintext=True AND u1.hasspn=True RETURN u1

queries.name: Return users with seasons in their password and are high value targets

queryList.query: MATCH (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintextpassword =~ "([Ww]inter.*|[sS]pring.*|[sS]ummer.*|[fF]all.*)" MATCH p=(u1:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(m:Group {highvalue:true}) RETURN u1

queries.name: Return users with seasons in their password and have local admin on at least one computer

queryList.query: match (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintextpassword =~ "([Ww]inter.*|[sS]pring.*|[sS]ummer.*|[fF]all.*)" match p=(u1:User)-[r:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Return users with seasons in their password and a path to high value targets (limit to 25 results)

queryList.query: match (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintextpassword =~ "([Ww]inter.*|[sS]pring.*|[sS]ummer.*|[fF]all.*)" MATCH p=shortestPath((u1:User)-[*1..]->(n {highvalue:true})) WHERE  u1<>n return u1 LIMIT 25

queries.name: Return users with a variant of "password" in their password and are high value targets

queryList.query: MATCH (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintextpassword =~ "(.*[pP][aA@][sS$][sS$][wW][oO0][rR][dD].*)" MATCH p=(u1:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(m:Group {highvalue:true}) RETURN u1

queries.name: Return users with a variant of "password" in their password and have local admin on at least one computer

queryList.query: match (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintextpassword =~ "(.*[pP][aA@][sS$][sS$][wW][oO0][rR][dD].*)" match p=(u1:User)-[r:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Return users with a variant of "password" in their password and a path to high value targets (limit to 25 results)

queryList.query: match (u1:User) WHERE u1.plaintextpassword =~ "(.*[pP][aA@][sS$][sS$][wW][oO0][rR][dD].*)"  MATCH p=shortestPath((u1:User)-[*1..]->(n {highvalue:true})) WHERE  u1<>n return u1 LIMIT 25

queries.name: Groups of High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH p=(n:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(m:Group {highvalue:true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Non Admin Groups with High Value Privileges

queryList.query: MATCH p=(g:Group)-[r:Owns|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|GenericWrite|AllowedToDelegate|ForceChangePassword]->(n:Computer)  WHERE NOT g.name CONTAINS 'ADMIN' RETURN p

queries.name: Groups with Computer and User Objects

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(groupsWithComps:Group) WITH groupsWithComps MATCH (u:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(groupsWithComps) RETURN DISTINCT(groupsWithComps) as groupsWithCompsAndUsers

queries.name: Groups that can reset passwords (Warning: Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:ForceChangePassword]->(n:User) RETURN p

queries.name: Groups that have local admin rights (Warning: Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Users never logged on and account still active

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User) WHERE n.lastlogontimestamp=-1.0 AND n.enabled=TRUE RETURN n

queries.name: Users logged in the last 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.lastlogon < (datetime().epochseconds - (90 * 86400)) and NOT u.lastlogon IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u

queries.name: Users with passwords last set in the last 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.pwdlastset < (datetime().epochseconds - (90 * 86400)) and NOT u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u

queries.name: Find if unprivileged users have rights to add members into groups

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User {admincount:False}) MATCH p=allShortestPaths((n)-[r:AddMember*1..]->(m:Group)) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all users a part of the VPN group

queryList.query: Match p=(u:User)-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group) WHERE toUPPER (g.name) CONTAINS 'VPN' return p

queries.name: Find computers with constrained delegation permissions and the corresponding targets where they allowed to delegate

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE c.allowedtodelegate IS NOT NULL RETURN c

queries.name: Next steps (3 hops) from owned objects

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((c {owned: true})-[*1..3]->(s)) WHERE NOT c = s RETURN p

queries.name: Owned users with permissions against GPOs

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u:User {owned:true})-[r:AllExtendedRights|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|GpLink*1..]->(g:GPO) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all other Rights Domain Users shouldn't have

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:Owns|WriteDacl|GenericAll|WriteOwner|ExecuteDCOM|GenericWrite|AllowedToDelegate|ForceChangePassword]->(n:Computer) WHERE m.objectid ENDS WITH '-513' OR m.objectsid ENDS WITH '-515' OR m.objectsid ENDS WITH 'S-1-5-11' OR m.objectsid ENDS WITH 'S-1-1-0' RETURN p

queries.name: Computers with administrative Domain Users

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:AddMember|AdminTo|AllExtendedRights|AllowedToDelegate|CanRDP|Contains|ExecuteDCOM|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|GetChanges|GetChangesAll|HasSession|Owns|ReadLAPSPassword|SQLAdmin|TrustedBy|WriteDACL|WriteOwner|AddAllowedToAct|AllowedToAct]->(t) WHERE m.objectsid ENDS WITH '-513' OR m.objectsid ENDS WITH '-515' OR m.objectsid ENDS WITH 'S-1-5-11' OR m.objectsid ENDS WITH 'S-1-1-0' RETURN p

queries.name: List all owned computers

queryList.query: MATCH (m:Computer) WHERE m.owned=TRUE RETURN m

queries.name: List all owned groups

queryList.query: MATCH (m:Group) WHERE m.owned=TRUE RETURN m

queries.name: List all High Valued Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (m) WHERE m.highvalue=TRUE RETURN m

queries.name: List the groups of all owned users

queryList.query: MATCH (m:User) WHERE m.owned=TRUE WITH m MATCH p=(m)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(n:Group) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all Kerberoastable Users

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User)WHERE n.hasspn=true RETURN n

queries.name: Find All Users with an SPN/Find all Kerberoastable Users with passwords last set less than 5 years ago

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.hasspn=true AND u.pwdlastset < (datetime().epochseconds - (1825 * 86400)) AND NOT u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u.name, u.pwdlastset order by u.pwdlastset

queries.name: Find Kerberoastable Users with a path to DA

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {hasspn:true}) MATCH (g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' MATCH p = shortestPath( (u)-[*1..]->(g) ) RETURN p

queries.name: Find machines Domain Users can RDP into

queryList.query: match p=(g:Group)-[:CanRDP]->(c:Computer) where g.objectid ENDS WITH '-513' return p

queries.name: Find what groups can RDP

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:CanRDP]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Find groups that can reset passwords (Warning: Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:ForceChangePassword]->(n:User) RETURN p

queries.name: Find groups that have local admin rights (Warning: Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all users that have local admin rights (Warning Can Be Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:User)-[r:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all users that have local admin rights or Groups (Warning Can Be Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:User)-[r:AdminTo|MemberOf*1..]->(n:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all active Domain Admin sessions

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User)-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-512' MATCH p = (c:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(n) return p

queries.name: Find all computers with Unconstrained Delegation

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer {unconstraineddelegation:true}) return c

queries.name: Find all computers with unsupported operating systems

queryList.query: MATCH (H:Computer) WHERE H.operatingsystem = '.*(2000|2003|2008|xp|vista|7|me).*' AND H.enabled = TRUE RETURN H

queries.name: Find users that logged in within the last 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.lastlogon < (datetime().epochseconds - (90 * 86400)) and NOT u.lastlogon IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u

queries.name: Find users with passwords last set within the last 90 days

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.pwdlastset < (datetime().epochseconds - (90 * 86400)) and NOT u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u

queries.name: Find constrained delegation

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u:User)-[:AllowedToDelegate]->(c:Computer) RETURN p

queries.name: Find computers that allow unconstrained delegation that ARENT domain controllers.

queryList.query: MATCH (c1:Computer)-[:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.objectid ENDS WITH '-516' WITH COLLECT(c1.name) AS domainControllers MATCH (c2:Computer {unconstraineddelegation:true}) WHERE NOT c2.name IN domainControllers RETURN c2

queries.name: Return the name of every computer in the database where at least one SPN for the computer contains the string 'MSSQL'

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE ANY (x IN c.serviceprincipalnames WHERE toUpper(x) CONTAINS 'MSSQL') RETURN c

queries.name: View all GPOs

queryList.query: Match (n:GPO) RETURN n

queries.name: View all groups that contain the word 'admin'

queryList.query: Match (n:Group) WHERE n.name CONTAINS 'ADMIN' RETURN n

queries.name: Find users that can be AS-REP roasted

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User {dontreqpreauth: true}) RETURN u

queries.name: Find All Users with an SPN/Find all Kerberoastable Users with passwords last set > 5 years ago

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.hasspn=true AND u.pwdlastset < (datetime().epochseconds - (1825 * 86400)) and NOT u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u

queries.name: Show all high value target's groups

queryList.query: MATCH p=(n:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(m:Group {highvalue:true}) RETURN p

queries.name: Find groups that contain both users and computers

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(groupsWithComps:Group) WITH groupsWithComps MATCH (u:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(groupsWithComps) RETURN DISTINCT(groupsWithComps) as groupsWithCompsAndUsers

queries.name: Find Kerberoastable users who are members of high value groups

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(g:Group) WHERE g.highvalue=true AND u.hasspn=true RETURN u

queries.name: Find Kerberoastable users and where they are AdminTo

queryList.query: OPTIONAL MATCH (u1:User) WHERE u1.hasspn=true OPTIONAL MATCH (u1)-[r:AdminTo]->(c:Computer) RETURN u1

queries.name: Find computers with constrained delegation permissions and the corresponding targets where they allowed to delegate

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer) WHERE c.allowedtodelegate IS NOT NULL RETURN c

queries.name: Find Users/Groups with direct access to GPOs

queryList.query: MATCH p = (n)-[r:AddMember|AddSelf|WriteSPN|AddKeyCredentialLink|AllExtendedRights|ForceChangePassword|GenericAll|GenericWrite|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|Owns]->(g:GPO) RETURN p

queries.name: Find if any domain user has interesting permissions against a GPO (Warning: Heavy)

queryList.query: MATCH p=(u:User)-[r:AllExtendedRights|GenericAll|GenericWrite|Owns|WriteDacl|WriteOwner|GpLink*1..]->(g:GPO) RETURN p

queries.name: Find if unprivileged users have rights to add members into groups

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User {admincount:False}) MATCH p=allShortestPaths((n)-[r:AddMember*1..]->(m:Group)) RETURN p

queries.name: Find all users a part of the VPN group

queryList.query: Match p=(u:User)-[:MemberOf]->(g:Group) WHERE toUPPER (g.name) CONTAINS 'VPN' return p

queries.name: Find users that have never logged on and account is still active

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User) WHERE n.lastlogontimestamp=-1.0 AND n.enabled=TRUE RETURN n

queries.name: Find an object in one domain that can do something to a foreign object

queryList.query: MATCH p=(n)-[r]->(m) WHERE NOT n.domain = m.domain RETURN p

queries.name: Find all sessions a user in a specific domain has

queryList.title: Select source domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(m:Computer)-[r:HasSession]->(n:User {domain:$result}) RETURN p

queries.name: Find an object from domain 'A' that can do anything to a foreign object

queryList.title: Select source domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name
MATCH p=(n {domain:$result})-[r]->(d) WHERE NOT d.domain=n.domain RETURN p

queries.name: Find All edges any owned user has on a computer

queryList.query: MATCH p=shortestPath((m:User)-[r*]->(b:Computer)) WHERE m.owned RETURN p

queries.name: Find Un-Supported OS and Enabled

queryList.query: MATCH (n:Computer) WHERE n.operatingsystem =~ '(?i).*(2000|2003|2008|xp|vista|7|me).*' AND n.enabled = true RETURN n

queries.name: Find Server 2008 with session

queryList.query: MATCH (H:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(y) WHERE H.operatingsystem =~ '(?i).*(2008).*' RETURN H

queries.name: Find Windows XP and Enabled

queryList.query: MATCH (H:Computer) WHERE H.operatingsystem =~ '(?i).*(xp).*' AND H.enabled = true RETURN H

queries.name: Find Windows XP with session

queryList.query: MATCH (H:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(y) WHERE H.operatingsystem =~ '(?i).*(xp).*' RETURN H

queries.name: Find Windows 7 and Enabled

queryList.query: MATCH (H:Computer) WHERE H.operatingsystem =~ '(?i).*(7).*' AND H.enabled = true RETURN H

queries.name: Find Windows 7 session

queryList.query: MATCH (H:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(y) WHERE H.operatingsystem =~ '(?i).*(7).*' RETURN H

queries.name: Find Server 2012 and Enabled

queryList.query: MATCH (H:Computer) WHERE H.operatingsystem =~ '(?i).*(2012).*' AND H.enabled = true RETURN H

queries.name: Find Server 2012 with session

queryList.query: MATCH (H:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(y) WHERE H.operatingsystem =~ '(?i).*(2012).*' RETURN H

queries.name: Find Server 2016 and Enabled

queryList.query: MATCH (H:Computer) WHERE H.operatingsystem =~ '(?i).*(2016).*' AND H.enabled = true RETURN H

queries.name: Find Server 2016 with session

queryList.query: MATCH (H:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(y) WHERE H.operatingsystem =~ '(?i).*(2016).*' RETURN H

queries.name: Find Server 2019 and Enabled

queryList.query: MATCH (H:Computer) WHERE H.operatingsystem =~ '(?i).*(2019).*' AND H.enabled = true RETURN H

queries.name: Find Server 2019 with session

queryList.query: MATCH (H:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(y) WHERE H.operatingsystem =~ '(?i).*(2019).*' RETURN H

queries.name: Find Server 2022 and Enabled

queryList.query: MATCH (H:Computer) WHERE H.operatingsystem =~ '(?i).*(2022).*' AND H.enabled = true RETURN H

queries.name: Find Server 2022 with session

queryList.query: MATCH (H:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(y) WHERE H.operatingsystem =~ '(?i).*(2022).*' RETURN H

queries.name: All Users with a homedirectory

queryList.query: MATCH p = (d:Domain)-[r:Contains*1..]->(u:User) WHERE u.homedirectory =~ '(?i).*.*' RETURN p

queries.name: All Computers without LAPS - with session

queryList.query: MATCH p = (d:Domain)-[r:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer)-[:HasSession]->(y) WHERE c.haslaps = false RETURN p

queries.name: All computers without LAPS and the computer is enabled

queryList.query: MATCH p = (d:Domain)-[r:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer) WHERE c.haslaps = false AND c.enabled = true RETURN p

queries.name: All enabled computers with a description

queryList.query: MATCH p = (d:Domain)-[r:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer) WHERE c.description =~ '(?i).*.*' RETURN p

queries.name: All enabled computers with a description containing the word file

queryList.query: MATCH p = (d:Domain)-[r:Contains*1..]->(c:Computer) WHERE c.description =~ '(?i).*file.*' RETURN p

queries.name: Locate enabled accounts with display name of admin - put anyname in you like

queryList.query: MATCH p = (d:Domain)-[r:Contains*1..]->(u:User) WHERE u.displayname =~ '(?i).*admin*' AND u.enabled = true RETURN p

queries.name: Find all users with passwords set over 720 days ago (23 months)

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.enabled=true AND u.pwdlastset < (datetime().epochseconds - (720 * 86400)) and NOT u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u

queries.name: Find all users with passwords set over 1440 days ago (47 months)

queryList.query: MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.enabled=true AND u.pwdlastset < (datetime().epochseconds - (1440 * 86400)) and NOT u.pwdlastset IN [-1.0, 0.0] RETURN u

queries.name: Find all Domain Admins (nested SID S-1-5-21-.*-512) having a session opened on a domain computer

queryList.query: MATCH (m:User)-[r:MemberOf*1..]->(n:Group) WHERE n.objectid =~ '(?i)S-1-5-.*-512' WITH m MATCH q=((m)<-[:HasSession]-(o:Computer)) RETURN q

queries.name: Find users that have never logged on and account is still active

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User) WHERE n.lastlogontimestamp=-1.0 AND n.enabled=TRUE RETURN n

queries.name: Find users that haven't logged on in 720 days and account is still active

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User) WHERE n.lastlogontimestamp < (datetime().epochseconds - (720 * 86400)) AND n.enabled=TRUE RETURN n

queries.name: Search for key words in users title such as scientist or Executive - tweak as required

queryList.query: MATCH p = (d:Domain)-[r:Contains*1..]->(u:User) WHERE u.title =~ '(?i).*scientist*' AND u.enabled = true RETURN p
